biotools.summary: MAGIIC-PRO is a tool for detecting patterns in protein sequences.  MAGIIC-PRO takes a protein sequence as input and helps users prepare training data for the pattern mining experiments by using Swiss-Prot annotations or by PSI-BLAST. Multiple resources for analysis of the detected patterns are also presented.
